JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Title: Junior Software Engineer (PHP & .net developer)      We are looking for Junior PHP and .net developers to join on an immediate basis.      Job Description/     Responsibilities       Build, deliver, and maintain software that integrates with Embedded Hardware and other industrial instruments.     Take complete accountability for your making development efficient, easy to understand, and highly reusable.     Write neat and clean code that adheres to certain professional norms and standards.       Skills and qualification       Web Application stack: PHP with Laravel framework, MYSQL, SQL     Desktop Application Stack: .NET Framework      Key Skills:   PHP, MySQL, JAVA, HTML5, PHP developer, WordPress     Location:   Andheri East, Mumbai (Candidates residing in Western Mumbai will be preferred).      Qualification:   B.Sc. (IT), BCA (Computer Application), MCA, IT software background.     Our culture respects developers who can independently own challenges and come up with solutions to resolve them.
